message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $90 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $90 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $95. This is a fair price considering the product's value, and I'm hoping we can reach an agreement.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to offer $92 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
